summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2102, for the improvement of 17th Avenue Northeast and 16th Avenue Northeast, each from East 65th Street to East 75th Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 21196 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
